Message.description: Asynchronous service is started.
TaskID-{0}: START- Assigned to worker thread.
TaskID-{0}: END- Completed successfully.
Asynchronous service is waiting for all worker thread to be complete.
Asynchronous service is stopped.
Asynchronous service is paused.
Asynchronous service is shutdown, but no guarantee that Asynchronous service is terminated appropriately.
There are no more running worker threads.
Asynchronous service may terminated properly by custom command.
Asynchronous service failed due to unexpected exception, please restart the service. Message: {0}
TaskID-{0}: FAIL- Stopped due to user stop command.
TaskID-{0}: FAIL- Aborted due to user abort command.
TaskID-{0}: RETRY- Abnormally ended due to BusinessApplicationException.
TaskID-{0}: RETRY- Abnormally ended due to other than the BusinessApplicationException.
TaskID-{0}: FAIL- Aborted because it exceeds the maximum number of retries.
TaskID-{0}: FAIL- Aborted due to unexpected exception. Message: {1}
Error while setting configuration key-value.
Asynchronous service is shutdown with pre-shutdown command.
AcceptedCommands field does not found.
Asynchronous service may shutdown with other than pre-shutdown command.
Copy-source does not exists.
Destination already exists.
While using the copy-source.
Stop command was sent to the asynchronous processing service task.
Abort command was sent to the asynchronous processing service task.
Azure has sent copy process was invalid.
Azure has sent copy process was failed.
Azure has sent copy process was aborted.
